item.title: Trudy add a quote by Janet Evanovich
Trudy add a quote by Sue Grafton
item.description: "It's pitiful to have a life in which junk food is awarded the same high status as sex." -- Sue Grafton

item.title: Trudy add a quote by Sue Grafton
item.description: "Thinking is hard work, which is why you don't see many people doing it." -- Sue Grafton

item.title: Trudy add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Honey, a man can't keep his gun in a cookie jar. It just isn't done." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Trudy add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Trudy add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Harry was left to ponder in silence the depths to which girls would sink to get revenge." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Trudy add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Percy wouldn't notice a joke if it danced naked in front of him wearing one of Dobby's hats." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Trudy add a quote by James Patterson
item.description: "Basically, I have two speeds.... Hostile or smart-aleck. Your choice." -- James Patterson

item.title: Trudy add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. It is not rude, it is not self-seeking, it is not easily angered, it keeps no record of wrongs. Love does not delight in evil but rejoices with the truth. It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres." -- Anonymous

item.title: Trudy add a quote by Amy Winehouse
item.description: "What kind of fuckery is this?" -- Amy Winehouse

item.title: Trudy add a quote by Chelsea Cain
item.description: "Something about the way she moves through the world does not lend itself to the care of fragile objects." -- Chelsea Cain

item.title: Trudy add a quote by Julie Garwood
item.description: "Noah, if we were to get married, you couldn't date anymore." -- Julie Garwood

item.title: Trudy add a quote by J.D. Robb
item.description:
"You've got no sense of humor."
"I'm going to laugh really hard after I kick your ass." -- J.D. Robb

item.title: Trudy add a quote by J.D. Robb
item.description: "Bite me." -Lieutenant Eve Dallas, from any of the In Death books." -- J.D. Robb

item.title: Trudy add a quote by J.D. Robb
item.description: "Lord, Give me the strength not to bitch slap this woman." -- J.D. Robb
